variable.name: EXTIDPAT
variable.description: External patient ID (masked family ID) - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: EXTIDPAT

variable.name: X_BARCOD
variable.description: Accession number barcode - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: X_BARCOD

variable.name: CURRELIG
variable.description: Current eligibility family - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: CURRELIG

variable.name: CURRTRIO
variable.description: Current trio family - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: CURRTRIO

variable.name: T_FAMID2
variable.description: T_FAMID2 masked, external family ID - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: T_FAMID2

variable.name: SITEJORG
variable.description: SITEJORG Joslin or GW or qc (j, g, q) - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: SITEJORG

variable.name: T_N_KID
variable.description: T_N_KID # proband/sib records/family - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: T_N_KID

variable.name: X_ID_REL
variable.description: X_ID_REL ID relative - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: X_ID_REL

variable.name: PROBAND
variable.description: Proband or sibling (Y/N) - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: PROBAND

variable.name: X_RASSPR
variable.description: RASS proband (Y/N) - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: X_RASSPR

variable.name: SEX
variable.description: Participant's gender - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: SEX

variable.name: AGE
variable.description: Age at entry (years) - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: AGE

variable.name: RACE
variable.description: Predominant race/ethnicity - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: RACE
variable.value: American Indian or Alaskan Native American

variable.name: ELIGTRIO
variable.description: Eligibility/trio status - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: ELIGTRIO

variable.name: RENALST
variable.description: Renal function status - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: RENALST

variable.name: ESRD
variable.description: End-stage renal disease (Y/N/U) - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: ESRD

variable.name: PANCR
variable.description: Did proband have a pancreas transplant? (Y/N/U) - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: PANCR

variable.name: ACR1
variable.description: Albumin-creatinine ratio (ACR)/Albumin-excretion rate (AER), 1st urine sample - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: ACR1

variable.name: ACR2
variable.description: Albumin-creatinine ratio (ACR)/Albumin-excretion rate (AER), 2nd urine sample - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: ACR2

variable.name: ACR3
variable.description: Albumin-creatinine ratio (ACR)/Albumin-excretion rate (AER), 3rd urine sample - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: ACR3

variable.name: ABCREATN
variable.description: Abnormal creatinine (Y/N/U) - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: ABCREATN

variable.name: CREATN
variable.description: Serum creatinine (mg/dL) - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: CREATN

variable.name: CYSTATIN
variable.description: Serum cystatin (mg/L) - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: CYSTATIN

variable.name: CHOLSTR
variable.description: Serum lipid cholesterol (mg/dL) - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: CHOLSTR

variable.name: HDL
variable.description: Serum lipid HDL (mg/dL) - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: HDL

variable.name: HBA1C
variable.description: Hemoglobin A1c (HbA1c; %) - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: HBA1C

variable.name: GFR1
variable.description: Glomerular filtration rate 1 (GFR1; MDRD [Modification of Diet in Renal Disease, see Levey et al., 1999, PMID: 10075613] ) - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: GFR1

variable.name: GFR2
variable.description: Glomerular filtration rate 2 (GFR2; Cockcroft-Gault; ml/min) - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: GFR2

variable.name: GFR3
variable.description: Glomerular filtration rate 3 (GFR3; 1/Serum Creatinine; dL/mg) - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: GFR3

variable.name: BMI
variable.description: Body Mass Index (kg/m²) - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: BMI

variable.name: WAIST
variable.description: Natural waist circumference (cm) - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: WAIST

variable.name: CURRSMK
variable.description: Is proband a current smoker? (Y/N/U) - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: CURRSMK

variable.name: EVERSMK
variable.description: Has proband ever smoked? (Y/N/U) - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: EVERSMK

variable.name: DIABETES
variable.description: Is proband diabetic? (Y/N/U) - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: DIABETES

variable.name: T1T2DIA
variable.description: Is proband diabetic? If yes, has he/she been diagnosed with type 1 or type 2 diabetes? - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: T1T2DIA

variable.name: INSULIN
variable.description: Is proband taking insulin? (Y/N/U) - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: INSULIN

variable.name: INSREGMN
variable.description: Is proband taking insulin? If yes, what is the insulin regimen? - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: INSREGMN

variable.name: INSDOSG
variable.description: Is proband taking insulin? If yes, what is the insulin dosage per kg body weight? - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: INSDOSG

variable.name: DIABDUR
variable.description: Is proband diabetic? If yes, since how long? (years) - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: DIABDUR

variable.name: ACE
variable.description: Is proband taking angiotensin converting enzyme (ACE) inhibitors? (Y/N/U) - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: ACE

variable.name: ANTH
variable.description: Is proband taking anti-hypertensive drugs? (Y/N/U) - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: ANTH

variable.name: LIP
variable.description: Is proband taking lipid lowering medication? (Y/N/U) - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: LIP

variable.name: SYSBP
variable.description: Systolic blood pressure (mmHg) - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: SYSBP

variable.name: DIABP
variable.description: Diastolic blood pressure (mmHg) - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: DIABP

variable.name: HYPERTEN
variable.description: Does proband have a history of hypertension? (Y/N/U) - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: HYPERTEN

variable.name: CARDIOV
variable.description: Does proband have a history of cardiovascular complication(s)? (Y/N/U) - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: CARDIOV

variable.name: PERIPHV
variable.description: Does proband have a history of peripheral vascular complication(s)? (Y/N/U) - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: PERIPHV

variable.name: GANGREN
variable.description: Does proband have a history of gangrene? (Y/N/U) - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: GANGREN

variable.name: AMPUTATN
variable.description: Does proband have a history of non-traumatic amputation? (Y/N/U) - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: AMPUTATN

variable.name: NEURP
variable.description: Does proband have a history of neuropathy due to diabetes? (Y/N/U) - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: NEURP

variable.name: FLASER
variable.description: Does proband have a history of focal laser treatment? (Y/N/U) - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: FLASER

variable.name: PLASER
variable.description: Does proband have a history of pan-retinal laser treatment? (Y/N/U) - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: PLASER

variable.name: AUTOIMMU
variable.description: Does proband have a history of auto-immune disease? - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: AUTOIMMU

variable.name: TIMEEVNT
variable.description: Time between diagnosis of type 1 diabetes (T1D) and kidney complications (years) - See also GAIN - GoKinD phs000018: TIMEEVNT
